content: Tom _____ basketball every weekend. A) play B) plays C) playing D) played
analysis: 主语Tom是第三人称单数，every weekend表示经常性动作，用一般现在时，动词用第三人称单数形式plays

content: The students _____ their homework now. A) do B) does C) are doing D) did
analysis: now表示现在正在进行的动作，用现在进行时are doing

content: Fill in the blank: She has _____ finished her work.
analysis: 现在完成时的肯定句中，already表示'已经'，通常放在助动词和过去分词之间

content: The book _____ I borrowed from the library is very interesting. A) who B) which C) where D) when
analysis: 先行词是物(book)，关系代词用which引导定语从句

content: Translate the sentence: 这本书比那本书更有趣。
answer: This book is more interesting than that one.
analysis: 比较级句型，interesting是多音节形容词，用more + 形容词原形构成比较级
